segments.text: Nearly released Gomez, so it's been that type of a game.
segments.speaker: SPEAKER_01

segments.text: Lots of mistakes.
segments.speaker: SPEAKER_01

segments.text: Fellaini, again, has brought himself to the attention of the referee, who now brings out the yellow card and says that is the fourth time.
segments.speaker: SPEAKER_01

segments.text: Yeah, well the referee, I didn't think he was going to book him actually, but in the end he put the yellow card on, put his arms out wide, as if to say, well, what else can I do?
segments.speaker: SPEAKER_01

segments.text: Poor touch from Fellaini, ball fired into him, ball bounces off him, and then typically, you know, he's just clumsy and he's awkward and he's made contact with cork,
segments.speaker: SPEAKER_01

segments.text: I'm not sure, I'm not absolutely certain it was a foul, actually, but he's all over Cork, isn't he?
segments.speaker: SPEAKER_01

segments.text: And Cork's taken the opportunity, he's felt the contact and gone down.
segments.speaker: SPEAKER_01

segments.text: And as you say, that's four free kicks.
segments.speaker: SPEAKER_01

segments.text: The referee has warned him on the last one.
segments.speaker: SPEAKER_01

segments.text: He's got to book him.
segments.speaker: SPEAKER_01

segments.text: Well, we'll show you at halftime, but Chelsea think they should have had a penalty at Stamford Bridge.
segments.speaker: SPEAKER_01

segments.text: Meanwhile, Stoke have scored.
segments.speaker: SPEAKER_01

segments.text: And yet another header.
segments.speaker: SPEAKER_01

segments.text: Lovely cross, and again, right in the middle of goal, Gius leaves Guzain helpless.
segments.speaker: SPEAKER_01
